info: Known for his iconic role as Tony Stark/Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Renowned for her versatile acting abilities and numerous Academy Award nominations.
An Oscar-winning actor and environmental activist, known for roles in Titanic, Inception, and The Revenant.
One of the highest-paid actresses in the world, recognized for her roles in Avengers, Lost in Translation, and Marriage Story.
A versatile actor known for his roles in Fight Club, Ocean's Eleven, and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, and his humanitarian work.
Actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian, known for her roles in Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, Maleficent, and Mr. & Mrs. Smith.
Multi-talented actor, rapper, and producer, famous for roles in The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, Men in Black, and The Pursuit of Happyness.
Academy Award-winning actress known for her roles in The Hunger Games series, Silver Linings Playbook, and American Hustle.
British actor and former diver known for his roles in the Transporter series, The Expendables, and Snatch.
Academy Award-winning actress known for her roles in La La Land, The Help, and Easy A.
Former professional wrestler turned actor, known as 'The Rock,' starred in numerous blockbuster films like Jumanji, Fast & Furious, and Moana.
Actress and model known for her roles in the Transformers series, Jennifer's Body, and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.
